XenotypeDef.label: hobgoblin
XenotypeDef.description: Hobgoblins, despite their clearly goblinoid appearance, are practically equal to humans aside from the goblinoid trait of having low psychic sensitivity.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Hobgoblins, despite their clearly goblinoid appearance, are practically equal to humans aside from the goblinoid trait of having low psychic sensitivity.
